name: "Alien Stealth Game"
description:
Top-Down, stealth-focused action game with immersive sim elements.  Use Sight, smell, and sound to your advantage as you must survive as the last remaining crew member aboard an alien-infested ship, Dynamic AI will hunt you down using their keen heightened sense. Use their senses against themselves in highly interactive environments.  
Gameplay demo is in the prototype stage, and does not include all gameplay elements in development or AI enemies. Demo includes both mouse & Keyboard and early Controller support.
